content: भांडं [भांड्-अच् भण्-ड स्वार्थे अण् वा <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A vessel, pot, utensil (plate, dish, can &c.); नीलीभांडं ‘an indigovat’; so क्षीरभांडं ‘a milk-pail’; सुरा°, मद्य° &c. {@--2@} A box, trunk, chest, case; क्षुरभांडं <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Any tool or instrument, an implement. {@--4@} A musical instrument. {@--5@} Goods, wares, merchandise, shop-keeper's stock; मथुरागामीनि भांडानि <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--6@} A bale of goods. {@--7@} (Fig.) Any valued possession, treasure; शांतं वा रघुनंदने तदुभयं तत्पुत्रभांडं हि मे <ls>U. 4. 26.</ls> {@--8@} The bed of a river. {@--9@} Trappings or harness of a horse. {@--10@} Buffoonery, mimicry (from भडं). {@--11@} An ornament in general. --डाः ({%<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>pl.</ab>) Wares, merchandise.
